name: Weird Algorithm
description: Simulate the Collatz sequence: if n is even divide by 2, else multiply by 3 and add 1 until n becomes 1.
output_format: Print all values of n during the algorithm.

name: Missing Number
description: Given numbers 1..n with one missing, find the missing value.
input: n and list of n-1 numbers

name: Repetitions
description: Find longest substring containing only one repeated DNA character.

name: Increasing Array
description: Minimum moves to make array non‑decreasing by increment operations.

name: Permutations
description: Construct permutation 1..n where no adjacent difference equals 1.

name: Knight Moves Grid
description: For each square, compute minimum knight moves to reach top‑left.

name: Grid Coloring I
description: Recolor grid so adjacent cells differ and each cell changes.

name: Digit Queries
description: Find kth digit in infinite concatenation of positive integers.

name: String Reorder
description: Reorder string so no adjacent chars equal; lexicographically minimal.

name: Distinct Numbers
description: Count number of distinct values in array.

name: Apartments
description: Match applicants to apartments within size tolerance.
input: n m k, desired sizes, apartment sizes

name: Bouncing Ball Steps
description: Simulate diagonal bouncing ball on grid for k steps.
input: t testcases with n m k

name: Shortest Subsequence
description: Find shortest DNA sequence not a subsequence of given string.

name: Dice Combinations
description: Count ways to form sum n using dice throws.

name: Counting Rooms
description: Count connected components of floor cells in grid.

name: Static Range Sum Queries
description: Answer sum queries on static array.

name: Subordinates
description: Compute number of subordinates for each employee in tree.

name: Josephus Queries
description: Find kth removed child in Josephus elimination.

name: Word Combinations
description: Count ways to form string using dictionary words.

name: Point Location Test
description: Determine if point lies LEFT, RIGHT or TOUCH relative to line.

name: Meet in the Middle
description: Count subsets whose sum equals x.

name: Sliding Window Sum
description: Compute xor of all sliding window sums using generator input.
explanation: Window sums are 14,15,22,27 so xor is 12.

name: Hidden Integer
description: Interactive problem to find hidden integer using comparisons.

name: Counting Bits
description: Count total number of set bits in numbers 1..n.

name: Maximum Xor Subarray
description: Find maximum xor value among all subarrays.
